meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Frances Way Parker East Kristin Morgan Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6520.

td.p: Frances Way, a math and drama teacher from Fort Collins, Colorado
Parker East, a performance artist from Tallahassee, Florida (whose 1-day cash winnings total $6,799)
Kristin Morgan, a strategic analyst for NASA from Huntsville, Alabama (whose 2-day cash winnings total $13,499)

tr.td: BE SPECIFIC
REAL POWER PLAYERS
BODY PART-POURRI
BEGINS & ENDS WITH O
BIO PICKS
INTERNATIONAL GEOGRAPHIC

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', '(Kristin: What is John Rockefeller?)

Nelson

KristinParker
')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td: Just "Rockefeller" isn't enough; we need the first name of Ford's veep

Parker
Frances
"BE" SPECIFIC
